channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP_SE -- SAP ECC and SAP S/4HANA (IS-OIL)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP_SE -- SAP ECC and SAP S/4HANA (IS-OIL)

item.title: CVE-2023-36922|2024-08-02T17:01:09.981Z -- sap_se -- sap%20ecc%20and%20sap%20s%2F4hana%20%28is-oil%29
item.description: Due to programming error in function module and report, IS-OIL component in SAP ECC and SAP S/4HANA allows an authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary operating system command into an unprotected parameter in a common (default) extension. Â On successful exploitation, the attacker can read or modify the system data as well as shut down the system.
